known_issues: Pre-med page: 'More Details in Knowledge Base' button label overflows on smaller screens; should be shortened to 'More Details' while keeping same link destination.
Meditation session page: play/pause button is square; should be circular.
Meditation session page: labels for Volume control and Adjusting Time control are not left-aligned with the left edge of their containers.
Meditation session page: Adjusting Time slider thumb visual position is reversed (drag left shows thumb right and vice versa); should behave left-to-right (left=less time, right=more time).

existing_features.title: On the Pre-Meditation page, change the "More Details" button label text to exactly "More Details" (English) to prevent overflow on small screens, while keeping the same link destination/behavior as before.
On the active meditation session view, update the Play/Pause control to render as a circular (round) icon button rather than a square button.

On the active meditation session view, left-align the labels for the Volume control and the Adjusting Time control so each label sits above-left and is aligned to the left edge of its corresponding control container.

Fix the Adjusting Time slider in the active meditation session view so the thumb position and track fill respond visually in the expected left-to-right direction (dragging left shows the thumb on the left; dragging right shows the thumb on the right; left corresponds to less time and right to more time).
